item.title: Fletching animations only set with levelup
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

It does that for all of them. So far, I only have unstrung shortbows done(awaiting fletching interface ID’s, if you happen to have…). This is my normal shortbow:

if(itemUsed == 946 && useWith == 1511 || itemUsed == 1511 && useWith == 946) { setAnimation(1248); deleteItem(1511, getItemSlot(1511), 1); addItem(50, 1); sendMessage("You carve a shortbow out of the logs."); addSkillXP(35, 9); }

I had it after the deleteItem, and moved it, with no change. Any ideas?

Thanks.

Read full topic
